messages.content: Welcome! How can I assist you today?
Hello! I'm JacQues, your assistant. I'm here to help answer your questions. What's on your mind today?

Charles Leclerc is a Monegasque Formula One racing driver who currently drives for Scuderia Ferrari. He made his Formula One debut in 2018 with Alfa Romeo Sauber and then switched to Ferrari in 2019. Leclerc has won several Grands Prix, including the 2019 Belgian Grand Prix and the 2019 Italian Grand Prix.
